column1: * 1915 - J.R.R. Tolkien writes the poem The Shores of Elfland.
* 1963 - J.R.R. Tolkiens paper "English and Welsh" is published in Angles and Britons.
* 1969 – J.R.R. Tolkien is diagnosed with an inflamed or diseased gall-bladder. Dr. Denis Tolhurst forbids him the consummation of fats (notably butter) and
* 1973 - J.R.R. Tolkien writes Letter to Norman Power.
* 1999 - The first Tolkien Thing is held in wikipedia:Cologne.
